text: The Hangover is a 2009 American comedy movie and the first installment of the trilogy. The movie is directed by Todd Phillips, and stars Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Justin Bartha, Ken Jeong, Heather Graham and Jeffrey Tambor. It follows three men looking for another friend in Las Vegas, before the wedding is cancelled. == Cast == * Bradley Cooper as Phil Wenneck * Ed Helms as Dr. Stu Price * Zach Galifianakis as Alan Garner * Heather Graham as Jade * Mike Epps as Black Doug * Justin Bartha as Doug Billings * Jeffrey Tambor as Sid Garner * Ken Jeong as Leslie Chow * Rachael Harris as Melissa * Rob Riggle as Officer Franklin * Sasha Barrese as Tracy Garner * Bryan Callen as Eddie * Ian Anthony Dale as Chow's henchmen * Gillian Vigman as Stephanie Wenneck ==Ratings== The Hangover received mostly positive reviews: *Rotten Tomatoes - 78% *Metacritic - 73% out of 100 *Roger Ebert - 4.5 out of 5 ==References== ==Other websites== *The Hangover's Official website * * Category:2009 buddy movies Category:2009 comedy movies Category:2000s black comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:Adventure comedy movies Category:2000s buddy comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies set in Las Vegas Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Todd Phillips Category:American road movies Category:American buddy comedy movies
title: The Hangover (movie)
